description.narrative: It is a universal law that time flies while the world spins. OMJD and VU therefore felt a need to pause in order to reflect upon and refine the aspirations of our partnership. During the past five years we have carried out various projects with wide effects, and during this development project we wish to focus . External impact takes internal cohesion.. This partnership rests on common pillars of democratic principles, youth empowerment, equal rights as well as constructive communication and cultural curiosity. It is definitely worth preserving and expanding. The mission of this partnership development is two folded: First, strengthening the collaborative bond between the two organizations given the many new project members. Secondly, creating ties to the board of Casablanca where our next grand project is planned to take place. Hence, we need to incorporate the local branches is our structure. An intended outcome of this specific project is to sharpen the purpose and shared principles of our partnership agreement for future cooperation. Our mission is to ensure sustainability.
